title: Survey-Based Self-Report Assessment Design for Developing AI Literacy Evaluation Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners access pre-learning materials through online platforms, then practice assessment tool development in face-to-face sessions. Evaluations center on survey items comprehensively measuring four dimensions (affective, behavioral, cognitive, and ethical learning)

learning_goals: Clearly distinguish and explain the four dimensions of AI literacy (affective, behavioral, cognitive, and ethical).
Design and validate a 32-item survey-based assessment tool with established validity and reliability.
Evaluate the structural validity of survey items using confirmatory factor analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
